key.name: position-in-panel
key.description: Where in the panel the monitors should be positioned.

key.name: show-icons
key.description: Display icons next to each monitor to help identify them.

key.name: show-animations
key.description: Use animations when the heights of meter bars change.

key.name: meter-fg-color
key.summary: Color of the meter bars and chart areas
key.description: The color of meter bars and chart areas, in either hex or RGBA format.

key.name: meter-fg-secondary-color
key.summary: Secondary color of the meter bars and chart areas
key.description: The secondary color of meter bars and chart areas, in either hex or RGBA format.

key.name: meter-bar-width
key.description: Width of the meter bars in 'em's. When a meter needs to show more than two bars, this value will be multiplied by .75; when a meter needs to show more than eight bars, this value will be multipled by .5.

key.name: cpu-show-cores
key.summary: Show a meter bar for each CPU core
key.description: When true, the CPU monitors will show a meter bar representing each CPU core. When false, one bar will represent all CPU usage.

key.name: network-usage-unit
key.description: Show network usage in bytes or bits.
